A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
First\, Kylo\, you are not Darth Maul\, you are boring emo wimp\, KEEP YOUR DAMN HELMET ON! 
Second\, Ren\, rei\, ray\, whoever\, still a Mary Sue... I guess SOMEONE likes that\, seeing people went to see it before the Blueray release. 
Third\, Salt Troopers. I actually thought this was clever jab\, but seeing how the writing otherwise is again by the same 5yo fanfict blogger\, no.
Fifth\, I guess people must have really been upset that TFA didn't have a Jar-Jar -enough of a character\, so you "gave us" Rose. Nice one\, you really do hate your audience\, don't you?
Sixth\, I just don't get what hell kind of loony-bin logic these movies operate with. Empire was nearly crushed in RotJ\, then they are suddenly building Super-Deathstar in TFA. Then that gets destroyed\, and instead of making them weaker\, they now rule the whole galaxy. Ok\, I guess Snoke is really a badass sith lord\, no wait he gets killed by his own stupidity and incompetence... wow\, ok\, what the fuck? Kylo in a complete pussyass\, so it was not by his "genious anything come true. His mini-hitler general is certainly not smart either\, just a another screeching lunatic. Fine what ever\, it''s " just a movie for kids"\, and it's dumb\, and I will rate it as such.
